server.// comment: Don't write server port in fleid 'host'

auth.// comment: Write true in fleid 'isCracked' for offline-mode servers, false - for online-mode servers

afk.// comment: Do bot will return same position after moving? Write true/false in 'returnToOrigin'

coords.// comment: Do bot will move target position after spawn? Write true/false in 'enabled'

chat.// comment: Do bot will write in chat? Write true/false in 'enabled'

periodicReconnect.// comment: Do bot will reconnect server with some delay? Write true/false in 'enabled'
